original_title: Rs. 2.2mn in cash found inside bunker in Udugampola
original_body_lines: Police Narcotics Bureau (PNB) officers have found ill-gotten cash amounting to Rs. 2.2 million inside an underground bunker at a house located in Udugampola.
The house is said to be owned by an accomplice of the notorious criminal figure ‘Ganemulla Sanjeewa’ who is in custody under detention orders.
